sentences.sentence: "I am fearful that he is delisting." said the doctor.
sentences.translation: 医生说：当时所有人流汗到地。“恐怕他已经死了。”

sentences.sentence: Short of an outright delisting, UNESCO can put sites on a “danger list”.
sentences.translation: 联合国教科文组织不能将文化遗址彻底除名，但它可以将其列入“黑名单”。

sentences.sentence: Delisting requires the assent of the five permanent members of the UN security council.
sentences.translation: 撤销名字需要联合国安理会五个常任理事国的同意。
